item.title: [PHP] vBulletin 3.8.x thread spammer
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:11, topic:345808"][quote author=The Soul link=topic=442060.msg3288722#msg3288722 date=1280382067]
I’m aware this has been gravedug and I have removed all of the previous spam however this is still a valid thread so I’ll leave it open.
[/quote]

Gravdug? Are you kidding me?[/quote]

A month of not posting and then all of the sudden someone bumps it is yes, gravedigging.

Read full topic

item.title: [PHP] vBulletin 3.8.x thread spammer
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

[code]<?php
/*

  •  PHP vB 3.8.x SPAMMER!

  •     Written by bool_

  •      Version 1.0
  • ps. used some guys script for the login func
    */
    $site = ‘http://sg-forum.info/’; // The forum to spam, must be root and have following /
    $delay = 60; // The delay in between posts(Might need to change depending on site).
    $thread_count = 1000; // The amount of threads to create per user.
    $accounts = array( ‘user1’ => “pass”, ‘user2’ => “pass” ); // The accounts to use.
    $cat_ids = array( 5, 4, 7, 37, 2, 49, 44, 84, 80, 32, 40, 17, 33, 91, 88, 57, 96 ); // The category ids to spam.
    $subjects = array("hider ", "sorrysweetheart "); // The things to use as subjects.
    $messages = array("howrutodai bigboi ", "lolwut ily "); // The strings to use as messages.
    $append_rand = true; // Append random letters, useful for sites that detect duplicate posts in time period.
    $ch = curl_init();
    curl_setopt ($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, “Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 5.01; Windows NT 5.0)”);
    curl_setopt ($ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, ‘50’);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, 1);
    curl_setopt ($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_REFERER, “http://www.google.com/”);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_COOKIEJAR, ‘cookies.txt’);
    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_COOKIEFILE, ‘cookies.txt’);

function vB_login($user, $pass) {
global $site, $ch;
$md5Pass = md5($pass);
$data = “do=login&vb_login_username=$user&securitytoken=guest&vb_login_md5password_utf=$md5Pass&vb_login_md5password=$md5Pass”;
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $site . ‘login.php?do=login’);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
curl_setopt($ch,CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
$buffer = curl_exec($ch);
$pos = strpos($buffer, “Thank you for logging in,”);
if($pos === FALSE) {
RETURN 0;
} else {
RETURN 1;
}
}

function vB_postthread($cat, $topic, $message) {
global $site, $ch;
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $site . ‘newthread.php?do=newthread&f=’ . $cat);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 0);
$buffer = curl_exec($ch);
$sectoken = ‘’;
$posthash = ‘’;
$posttime = ‘’;
$userid = ‘’;
preg_match(’#(.+?)#’, $buffer, $sectoken);
preg_match(’#(.+?)#’, $buffer, $posthash);
preg_match(’#(.+?)#’, $buffer, $posttime);
preg_match(’#(.+?)#’, $buffer, $userid);
if(!$sectoken[1] or !$posthash[1] or !$posttime[1] or !$userid[1]) {
vB_postthread($cat, $topic, $message); // try to get info again.
}
$data = ‘do=postthread&subject=’ . urlencode($topic) . ‘&message=’ . urlencode($message) . ‘&wysiwyg=0&iconid=0&securitytoken=’
. $sectoken[1] . ‘&sbutton=Submit+New+Thread&parseurl=1&emailupdate=9999&polloptions=4&f=’ . $cat . ‘&posthash=’ . $posthash[1] .
‘&poststarttime=’ . $posttime[1] . ‘&loggedinuser=’ . $userid[1];
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $site . ‘newthread.php?do=postthread&f=’ . $cat);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
curl_setopt($ch,CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
$buffer = curl_exec($ch);
if(stristr($buffer, ‘you do not have permission to access this page’)) {
return false;
} elseif(stristr($buffer, 'Please try again in ')) {
return false;
} else {
return true;
}
}

function loginToAccount($account, $pass) {
if(!vB_login($account, $pass)) {
loginToAccount($account, $pass); // retry until you get in.
} else {
echo “logged in to acc " . $account . " \n”;
}
}

for($count = 0; $count < $thread_count; $count++) {
$account_names = array_keys($accounts);
for($i = 0; $i < count($accounts); $i++) {
$account = $account_names[$i];
loginToAccount($account, $accounts[$account]);
$thread_title = $subjects[rand(0, count($subjects) - 1)];
$thread_message = $messages[rand(0, count($messages) - 1)];
if($append_rand) {
$thread_title .= rand(99999, 9999999);
$thread_message .= rand(99999, 9999999);
}
vb_postthread($cat_ids[rand(0, count($cat_ids) - 1)], $thread_title, $thread_message);
if(count($accounts) >= $delay) {
sleep(1000); // sleep for a second if there are more accounts than the delay.
} else {
sleep($delay / count($accounts)); // sleep for however long until new thread needs to be made.
}
}
}
curl_close($ch);
?>[/code]

have fun.
oh and the more accounts the faster it will spam.

Read full topic
